name: Machine Mayhem
description:
Hi! My name is Justin Q. I am a Junior at UCSC and this is a card game made for one of my classes. It is the very first fully finished game I have made in my life! This game will be played on PlayingCards.io and can be played by 1-3 players. So grab your friends and play the game together.

The Machine Mayhem.zip will include:

  • pcio file (used in playingcards.io to play the game)
  • PDF of Game Rules (with instruction on how to load up the game inside)
